p.k: When Small Hands returns home from his morning meeting, he finds sexy wife Azul Hermosa doing her chores half-dressed. Small Hands takes on his usual dominant role with her as she works: grabbing, pawing, worshipping, until - noon already? Time for Azul to change into her professional attire ahead of the big board meeting, while Small Hands is left to do some of his own chores around the house. When Azul gets home, the couple find their roles reversed, with Azul being dominant and horny while Small Hands tries to finish fixing the sink. Will these two ever find time to fuck?
